column3: 0Nice game, but a lot of sh!ty ads and asking obsessively for rating  Update 10/08/2017 Regarding the answer from developer: guys, are you broken or something? You keep posting the same answer / reply to all ratings. Do you have a monkey there who's doing copy / paste?

This game is great.  I need to get out of my head sometimes and just enjoy myself.  This game helps me do both.  I play pretty quickly and don't think too far in advance.  It has given me hours and hours of enjoyment.
Great game. Annoyingly asks for ratings after each game. You're rated now. Let's see if this begging will end

I really like the game; however, I find the numbers floating around in the 
background very distracting and hurts my eyes. I may have to uninstall 
because of this. Is there a way to calm the background down?
Wouldn't you prefer an honest review?Automatically loses stars because it specifically asks for a five star rating. Adequate 2048 game. Not outstanding

Better graphics than most, however, the sound needs some change. I have played similar games, that have a slight increase in ring tone, w/ each higher pairing (& l loved it; very gratifing!). Also, to me @least, the tones in this game are nerve grating...perhaps, the type of tones used are too echoi...Full ReviewBetter graphics than most, however, the sound needs some change. I have played similar games, that have a slight increase in ring tone, w/ each higher pairing (& l loved it; very gratifing!). Also, to me @least, the tones in this game are nerve grating...perhaps, the type of tones used are too echoing, as well as, high in pitch?  Improve the ringing, then you'll have your 5 star.  Still, well done!
